differences.actualValue: <speak>I'm sorry that the Plus Card was declined. There are a few reasons why this may have happened. The card may be declined, if you are at the wrong merchant. Or, if the order total is higher than the amount pre-approved by the customer, the Plus Card will be declined. Please do not tip on the order. If the customer approves a substitute item, the item must be of equal, or lesser value to the original item. Even if your card is declined, you can choose to use your own card or cash instead. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info.<break time="750ms"/> </speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I understand you don't have the Plus Card. If you want, you can choose to use your own payment method to complete this delivery, and get reimbursed later. In the app, you can change the payment method, from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. For more information on how this works, say, reimbursement info.
